content.html: "I had a black friend". Singular. Not multiple. One. "I liked her, and I think she liked me". My intentions were pure. Not so sure about hers. "Now she's hostile & unpleasant" Stereotypes of black ppl being angry & violent. "I'm sure I didn't do anything" I'm the victim here
content.value:
"I had a black friend". 
Singular. Not multiple. One.

"I liked her, and I think she liked me".
My intentions were pure. Not so sure about hers.

"Now she's hostile & unpleasant"
Stereotypes of black ppl being angry & violent. 

"I'm sure I didn't do anything"
I'm the victim here
